data.text: The most regretful people on earth are those who felt the call to creative work, who felt their own creative power restive and uprising and gave to it neither power nor time.
data.author: Mary Oliver

data.text: A personâ€™s life purpose is nothing more than to rediscover, through the detours of art, or love, or passionate work, those one or two images in the presence of which his heart first opened.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.text: The first draft of anything is shit.
data.author: Ernest Hemingway
